required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Analysis of Effects and Side Effects in Patients Undergoing Radiation Therapy
clinical_study.official_title: Analysis of Effects and Side Effects in Patients Undergoing Radiation Therapy - Quality Control Using Clinical Database

brief_summary.textblock:
To collect and analyze effects and side effects in patients undergoing radiotherapy.
This study investigates how analysis of effects and side effects will influence outcome of patients. These retrospectively collected data allow to adapt and improve radiotherapy treatment regimens .

detailed_description.textblock: Effects and side effects in patients undergoing radiotherapy will be collected over the next five years (2015-2020). It is planned to include 600 to 650 new patients referred for radiotherapy per calender year. It is estimated that 3000 patients will be included at the end of the study after five years. Patient Information on diseae and treatment will be collected and analyzed. Common statistical algorithms will be performed for outcome analysis.

clinical_study.why_stopped: General Informed Consent has been introduced at the Hospital, no need for study anymore

primary_outcome.measure: Side effects in patients undergoing radiotherapy (CTCAE v4.03)
primary_outcome.description: acute and late side effects according to CTCAE

study_pop.textblock: Patients undergoing radiotherapy at the Kantonsspital Graubuenden

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients undergoing radiotherapy at the Kantonsspital Graubuenden
Exclusion Criteria:
- No radiotherapy at Kantonsspital Graubuenden
- Age: < 20 years, > 105 years

overall_official.affiliation: Kantonsspital Winterthur, Department of Radiation Oncology

facility.name: Kantonsspital Graubuenden, Department of Radiaton Oncology
